description.value: Your body is covered in sharp needles or spines which you can use to defend yourself. Each time you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} by a creature or an adjacent creature hits you with an unarmed attack, you twist and thrash your body around, dealing [[/r {2}[piercing]]]{2 piercing Damage} to that creature. This damage increases to 3 at 9th level, 4 at 13th level, and 5 at 17th level.

value.value: Cactus Leshy or Pine Leshy heritage
